content.text:
I don't have the capability to search the web in real-time. My responses are based on a fixed knowledge base that was last updated in 2022. This means I can provide information on a wide range of topics, but I won't be able to access the latest news, updates, or real-time data.

If you need the most current information, I recommend checking reliable online sources or using a web search engine. If you have any questions or need help understanding information you've found online, I'm here to assist with that!
